column1: Applying a stringent threshold to the output allowed us to identify two groups - genes with high - scoring upstream palindromes ( ssaB, ssaG, ssaM, ssaR, sopD2, sifA, sifB, sseK2, sseK3, sseL, sseA ', steC, and srcA) and those with medium - scoring palindromes ( 0. 7 - 0. 8 threshold; ssrA, STM1633, sseI, slrP sspH2, pipB, sseJ, pipB2, srfN, sseA and steB) ( Figure 6A and Dataset S4) ( sseA ' denotes the SsrB palindrome sequence upstream of sseA that falls within the ssaE CDS, while sseA refers to the SsrB - footprinted IGR site with only one conserved heptamer defined in Figure 4C).
